mapper.insert: INSERT into review (user_id, title, content, date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, now());
INSERT into routine (review_no, video_no, difficulty) VALUES (#{reviewNo}, #{videoNo}, #{difficulty})
mapper.select: SELECT no, user_id userId, title, content, date FROM review ORDER BY date DESC

SELECT v.no, v.title, v.part_no partNo, v.channel_name channelName, v.url, v.spot_no spotNo FROM video v INNER JOIN ( select video_no from routine where review_no = #{reviewNo}) r ON v.no = r.video_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (review_no, user_id, comment, date) VALUES (#{reviewNo}, #{userId}, #{comment}, now())
